metadata.title: CVE-2022-1190 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Improper handling of user input in GitLab CE/EE versions 8.3 prior to14.7.7, 14.8 prior to 14.8.5, and 14.9 prior to 14.9.2 allowed an attackerto exploit a stored XSS by abusing multi-word milestone references in issuedescriptions, comments, etc.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
